objects.text:
• 100% Pure & Natural Whole Milk
• No Artificial Hormones or Preservatives
• Rich in Essential Nutrients & Calcium
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Dairy Collection - Premium Natural Milk
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure & Natural Whole Milk
• No Artificial Hormones or Preservatives
• Rich in Essential Nutrients & Calcium
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed
• Available in Various Sizes: Bottle, Pitcher, and Glass Serving
• Perfect for Cooking, Baking, and Direct Consumption
• Locally Sourced from Premium Dairy Farms
• Crystal Clear Glass Packaging - Eco-friendly Choice
• Creamy Texture and Rich, Natural Taste
• Ideal for Family Daily Nutrition Needs

banner_details:
This banner design promotes a dairy product with a clean, modern layout and a fresh aesthetic. It features a bold uppercase headline ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in deep blue to instantly grab attention, followed by a vibrant green tagline ("tagline") that emphasizes freshness. Below is a concise product description ("description") in bullet form, offering crucial benefits in a dark gray font for readability. Supporting text ("subheading_1" and "subheading_2") builds trust and highlights quality. A large blue price tag ("price") adds urgency, while a green call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") encourages immediate engagement. A realistic milk product image ("product_image") balances the composition visually. 

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#F0F8FF`
- Light Blue Accent: `#D6EDFF`
- Blue: `#0066CC`
- Soft Green: `#33A33C`
- Dark Gray: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of milk in glass containers displays a soft, clean, and refreshing color palette. The dominant color is creamy white (#F8F8F2), representing purity and freshness of the milk. This is complemented by the cool, translucent blues used in the edges and handles of the glassware (#89BFEA and #B9DFF7), which add a crisp and hygienic touch. Highlights and shadows in light gray (#E3E6EB) and soft silver tones (#C5CCD3) subtly enhance the glass texture without overpowering the milk's purity. These colors blend smoothly to project clarity and vitality, making them ideal for a minimalist and trustworthy advertisement banner design.
